mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comfree(freeNum, userId, freeSubject, freeContent, freeCreated, freeHitCount, freePet) VALUES (comfree_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{freeSubject}, #{freeContent}, SYSDATE, 0, #{freePet})
mapper.select:
SELECT f.freeNum, f.userId, userNick, freeSubject, to_char(freeCreated, 'YYYY-MM-DD') freeCreated, freeHitCount, freePet, NVL(replyCount, 0) replyCount, NVL(boardLikeCount, 0) boardLikeCount FROM comfree f JOIN member1 m ON m.userId=f.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT freeNum, COUNT(*) replyCount FROM comFreeReply WHERE freeReplyType=0 GROUP BY freeNum ) c ON f.freeNum=c.freeNum LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT freeNum, COUNT(*) boardLikeCount FROM comFreeLike WHERE likeNo=1 GROUP BY freeNum ) l ON f.freeNum=l.freeNum
ORDER BY
replyCount DESC freeHitCount DESC boardLikeCount DESC f.freeNum DESC
OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM comfree f JOIN member1 m ON m.userId=f.userId

SELECT freeNum, f.userId, userNick, freeSubject, freeContent, to_char(freeCreated, 'YYYY-MM-DD') freeCreated, freeHitCount, freePet FROM comfree f JOIN member1 m ON m.userId=f.userId WHERE freeNum=#{freeNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE comfree SET freeHitCount=freeHitCount+1 WHERE freeNum = #{freeNum}
UPDATE comfree SET freeSubject=#{freeSubject}, freeContent=#{freeContent}, freePet=#{freePet} WHERE freeNum=#{freeNum} AND userId=#{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comFreeLike(freeNum, userId, likeNo) VALUES (#{freeNum}, #{userId}, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM comFreeLike WHERE freeNum=#{freeNum} AND likeNo=1
SELECT likeNo FROM comFreeLike WHERE freeNum=#{freeNum} AND userId=#{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM comFreeLike WHERE freeNum=#{freeNum} AND userId=#{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comFreeReply(freeReplyNum, freeReplyContent, freeReplyCreated, freeReplyType, freeNum, userId) VALUES (comfreereply_seq.NEXTVAL, #{freeReplyContent}, SYSDATE, #{freeReplyType}, #{freeNum}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM comFreeReply WHERE freeNum=#{freeNum} AND freeReplyType=0

SELECT r.freeReplyNum, r.userId, userNick, freeNum, freeReplyContent, to_char(freeReplyCreated, 'YYYY-MM-DD') freeReplyCreated, answerCount, replyLikeCount FROM comFreeReply r JOIN member1 m ON m.userId=r.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT freeReplyType, COUNT(*) answerCount FROM comFreeReply where freeReplyType!=0 Group by freeReplyType ) c ON r.freeReplyNum=c.freeReplyType LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT freeReplyNum, COUNT(*) replyLikeCount FROM comFreeReplyLike WHERE likeNo=1 GROUP BY freeReplyNum ) l ON l.freeReplyNum=r.freeReplyNum WHERE freeNum=#{freeNum} AND r.freeReplyType=0 ORDER BY r.freeReplyNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
